original_text: It does not matter whether anyone has circumcised you or not. What matters is that God has made you a new person.
korean_text: 할례나 무할례가 아무 것도 아니로되 오직 새로 지으심을 받는 것만이 중요하니라

sentences.original_text: whether anyone has circumcised you or not
that God has made you a new person
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 당신을 새 사람으로 만드셨다는 것입니다
